page.title: 09A PENSIONER'S DAY
page.content: Mrs. Black lives in the sheltered housing in the village.Her day begins with breakfast and the Glasgow Herald. By bus she goes to the chiropodist in the Health Centre in Barrhead,then along to the chemist or Presto for some shopping.Next she goes to the chippie for a cup of tea till her son comes to pick her up. At home she reads,listens to Radio 4 or watches television,any programmes. If she is at home in the morning she might go to a coffee morning in the church.On Sundays she goes to church. Her one hobby is gardening when the weather is suitable. What annoys her is when the big boys come and play football on the grass in front of her house,or start shouting.
